description:
Auction 24th Jan @ 5pm onwards, The Langham Hotel - 38 Old Burleigh Road, Surfers Paradise

Flawless craftsmanship, design and resort-style entertaining unite in this extraordinary family masterpiece in a class of its own. Presiding over a pristine 1.15 acre paradise and surrounded by immaculate lush green landscaped gardens, this family entertainer located in the prestigious Huntington Downs estate is the epitome of peace and privacy.

Perfectly configured to accommodate growing families, it features a generous layout with multiple living areas including family and dining rooms opening seamlessly to the spectacular entertainers' backyard of a secluded alfresco area including an outdoor kitchen with BBQ, single gas hot plate and bar fridge. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with European appliances, stone waterfall benchtop, induction cooktop, breakfast bar and vast storage.  All overlooking the sparkling swimming pool, private landscaped gardens and expansive lush lawn soaking up the northerly sunshine.

Accommodation comprises two separate wings with four generous bedrooms, all of which are appointed with built-in wardrobes and ceiling fans. With the children's wing incorporating a separate living/play area, fully tiled bathroom and separate toilet. The designer master wing features a boutique-style walk-in wardrobe and a deluxe fully tiled ensuite with a mosaic-tiled shower and dual vanity.

Further highlights include a separate study and fully equipped dedicated media room with, zoned ducted air conditioning, full security system including cameras, polished porcelain tiles, solar panels and plantation shutters. The home is complete with triple remote garaging as well as a separate driveway with access to a 11.9m x 7.0m work shed or alternatively, garage space for 4 extra vehicles.

Property Features:
- 1.15 Acre Allotment (4,664m2)
- 4 Bed, 2 Bath, garaging for 7 Cars
- steel framed home
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and deluxe double vanity ensuite
- 3 Further well-appointed bedrooms with large shared bathroom
- Entertainers kitchen with quality appliances and plethora of storage
- Open plan living and dining flooded with natural light
- Dedicated outdoor dining and lounging zones
- Large poolside alfresco with built in outdoor BBQ cooktop & bar fridge
- Large artificial grassed area ideal for children/pets
- Fully equipped dedicated media room
- Study/home office with built in cabinetry and an abundance of storage
- Solar Panels
- Full security system including cameras
- Vacuum maid system
- Sonos inbuilt speaker system installed in ceilings
- Conveniently located, moments to the M1 Motorway, schools, Westfield Shopping Centre, theme parks and public transport

Disclaimer: The above information has not been verified. We advise you confirm the accuracy of details before entering into a contract.
Amir Prestige and its employees cannot be held responsible for any inaccurate details supplied here.
